#summary Instructions for Developers to Setup ROS with ua-ros-pkg

  # If the machine has never had ROS installed it, do this first:
{{{
sudo apt-get install build-essential python-yaml cmake subversion git-core
}}}
  # Download the rosinstall file
{{{
wget --no-check-certificate http://ros.org/rosinstall -O ~/rosinstall
}}}
  # Make it executable
{{{
chmod 755 ~/rosinstall
}}}
  # Install ROS!
{{{
~/rosinstall ~/ros http://ua-ros-pkg.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/config/cturtle.rosconfig
}}}
  # Update your .bashrc
{{{
echo "source ~/ros/setup.sh" >> ~/.bashrc
echo "export ROBOT=sim" >> ~/.bashrc
source ~/.bashrc
}}}
  # Run the script that makes all the UA packages
{{{
~/ros/ua-ros-pkg/make-all.sh
}}}
